Description_lang: While in an Eclipse, the cost of Starsurge and Starfall is reduced by $s2%.

description_blz.en_US: While in an Eclipse, the cost of Starsurge and Starfall is reduced by 15%.
description_blz.es_MX: Durante un Eclipse, el costo de Oleada de estrellas y Lluvia de estrellas se reduce un 15%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Enquanto estiver em Eclipse, o custo de Surto Estelar e Chuva Estelar é reduzido em 15%.
description_blz.de_DE: Während einer Finsternis sind die Kosten von 'Sternensog' und 'Sternenregen' um 15% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: While in an Eclipse, the cost of Starsurge and Starfall is reduced by 15%.
description_blz.es_ES: Durante Eclipse, el coste de Oleada de estrellas y de Lluvia de estrellas se reduce un 15%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Pendant une éclipse, le coût d’Éruption stellaire et de Météores est réduit de 15%.
description_blz.it_IT: Durante un'Eclissi, il costo di Cometa Arcana e Pioggia di Stelle si riduce del 15%.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Затмение" снижает затраты на применение "Звездного потока" и "Звездопада" на 15%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 일월식 상태일 때 별빛쇄도와 별똥별의 자원 소모량이 15%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在蝕星蔽月作用期間，星湧術和星殞術的消耗降低15%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在日月之蚀状态下，星涌术和星辰坠落的消耗降低15%。
